  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108252</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085861</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The value of oral history</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Wert der Mundgeschichte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La valeur de l'histoire orale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O valor do history oral</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il valore di storia orale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αξία της προφορικής ιστορίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El valor de la historia oral</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Why use oral history with your students? Oral history has benefits that no other historical source provides.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Warum verwenden Sie Mundgeschichte mit Ihren 
Kursteilnehmern? Mundgeschichte hat Nutzen, den keine andere 
historische Quelle voraussetzt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pourquoi utilisez l'histoire orale avec vos 
étudiants ? L'histoire orale a les avantages qu'aucune autre 
source historique ne fournit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Por que use o history oral com seus estudantes? 
O history oral tem os benefícios que nenhuma outra fonte 
histórica fornece.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Perchè usi la storia orale con i vostri allievi? 
La storia orale ha benefici che nessuna altra sorgente storica 
assicura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γιατί προφορική ιστορία χρήσης με τους σπουδαστές 
σας; Η προφορική ιστορία έχει τα οφέλη που καμία άλλη 
ιστορική πηγή δεν παρέχει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Por qué utilice la historia oral con sus 
estudiantes? La historia oral tiene ventajas a que ninguna otra 
fuente histórica proporcione.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

END:VCARD</entity>

        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
